mapper.select: SELECT review_no, user_id, product_no, subject, content, reg_date, rating, img_url, (select order_product_name from order_product where order_product.product_no = review.product_no) as item_name, (select count(cno) from comment where comment.review_no = review.review_no) AS cnt FROM review ORDER BY review_no desc

SELECT review_no, user_id, product_no, subject, content, reg_date, rating, img_url, (select order_product_name from order_product where order_product.product_no = review.product_no) as item_name FROM review WHERE review_no = #{review_no}
